LUI $t0 0X0002
SRL $t0 $t0 0X10

LUI $t1 0XFFFF
LUI $t2 0XFFFE
SRL $t2 $t2 0X10
ADDU $t1 $t1 $t2

MULT $t0 $t1

MFHI $v0

JR $ra


SHOULD OUTPUT 255 FROM HI REG (SIGNED)
NOT 1 (UNSIGNED)

3C080002
00084402
3C09FFFF
3C09FFFE
000A5402
012A4821
01090018
00001010
03E00008

3C080002000844023C09FFFF3C09FFFE000A5402012A4821010900180000101003E00008


FFFFFFFE = -2
11111111111111111111111111111110

00000001FFFFFFFE = what it should be
00000000000000000000000000000001,11111111111111111111111111111100
FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFC = it shouldn't be
11111111111111111111111111111111,11111111111111111111111111111100
